content.question: A dose of 400 milligrams of a drug is administered to a patient. The amount of the drug, in milligrams, in the person’s bloodstream at time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, in hours, is given by <math alttext="A, of t " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math>. The rate at which the drug leaves the bloodstream can be modeled by the differential equation <math alttext="the derivative of A, with respect to t, equals, k A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow><mrow><mi>d</mi><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>k</mi><mi>A</mi></mrow></mstyle></math>, where <math alttext="k" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>k</mi></mrow></mstyle></math> is a constant. Which of the following could be an expression for <math alttext="A, of t " display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow></mstyle></math> ?

choices.label: <math alttext="A, of t, equals, 400 times e raised to the negative 0.3 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>400</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.3</mn></mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

<math alttext="A, of t, equals, e raised to the negative 0.3 t power, plus 399" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.3</mn></mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>399</mn></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="A, of t, equals, negative 3 t, plus 400" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mi>t</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>400</mn></mrow></math>

<math alttext="A, of t, equals, negative 1.5 times t squared, plus 400" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>1.5</mn></mrow></mrow></mstyle></mrow><msup><mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>400</mn></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="A, of t, equals, 400 times e raised to the negative 0.3 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mi>A</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>400</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.3</mn></mrow><mi>t</mi></mrow></msup></mrow></math>
